entries.name: Yaş
entries: Aarakocralar 3 yaşında yetişkinliğe ulaşırlar. İnsanlara oranla Aarakocralar çok yaşamaz, ömürleri nadiren 30 yılı geçer.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Aarakocraların çoğu iyidir, düzen ve kaos arasında nadiren taraf seçerler. Kabile liderleri ve savaşçılar düzenli olabilir, kaşifler ve maceracılarda düzensizliğe yönelebilir.

entries.name: Uçuş
entries: 50 feet uçma hızın vardır. Bu hızı kullanabilmek için orta yada ağır zırh giyemezsin.

entries.name: Pençeler
entries: Silahsız saldırılarınla uzmansındır ve vurunca 1d4 kesme hasarı verir.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Aarakocra, Auran ve Ortak dillerini okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Genasi insanlarla aynı hızda olgunlaşırlar ve ergenlik sonrası yetişkin sayılırlar. İnsanlara oranla biraz daha uzun yaşayıp 120 yaşını görebilirler.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Bağımsız ve kendine güvenen genasiler nötr yönelimdedirler.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Primordial ve Ortak dillerini okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. Primordial sert ünsüzler ve kaba hecelerle dolu diyaframdan konuşulan bir dildir.

entries.name: Sonsuz Nefes
entries: Bilinçsiz olmadığın sürece nefesini sonsuz tutabilirsin.

entries.name: Rüzgara Katıl
entries: {@spell Levitate} büyüsünü bu özellikle materyal bileşenlere ihtiyaç duymadan bir kez kullanabilirsin. Bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyü için büyü yapma yeteneğin Dayanıklılıktır.

entries.name: Toprak Yürüyüşü
entries: Toprak yada taştan oluşan zorlu yüzeylerden fazladan hareket harcamadan geçebilirsin.

entries.name: Taşla Birleş
entries: {@spell Pass without trace} büyüsünü bu özellikle materyal bileşenlere ihtiyaç duymadan bir kez kullanabilirsin. Bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyü için büyü yapma yeteneğin Dayanıklılıktır.

entries.name: Gece Görüşü
entries: 60 feet yakınında loş ışıkta parlak ışıkmış gibi, karanlıkta loş ışıkmış gibi görürsün. Elemental Ateş Boyutuna olan bağından dolayı gece görüşün farklıdır: karanlıkta gördüğün herşey kırmızı tonlarında olur.

entries.name: Ateş Direnci
entries: Ateş hasarına direncin vardır.

entries.name: Aleve Ulaş
entries: {@spell Produce flame} cantripini bilirsin. 3. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell burning hands} büyüsünü bir kez 1. seviye büyü olarak kullanabilirsin. Büyüyü bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyüler için büyü yapma yeteneğin Dayanıklılıktır.

entries.name: Asit Direnci
entries: Asit hasarına direncin vardır.

entries.name: Amfibi
entries: Hava ve su soluyabilirsin.

entries.name: Yüzme
entries: 30 feet yüzme hızın vardır.

entries.name: Dalganın Çağrısı
entries: {@spell Shape water|xge} cantripini bilirsin. 3. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell create or destroy water} büyüsünü bir kez 2. seviye büyü olarak kullanabilirsin. Büyüyü bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyü için büyü yapma yeteneğin Dayanıklılıktır.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Elfler olgunluğa insanlarla aynı sürede ulaşsa da elflerin yetişkinlik anlayışı fiziksel büyümedense dünyevi deneyimler ile ölçülür. Bir elf genel olarak yetişkinliği ve bir yetişkin ismini 100 yaşı civarında alır ve 750 yaşına kadar yaşayabilir.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Elfler özgürlüğü, çeşitliliği ve kendilerini ifade etmeyi severler. Bu sebepten daha düzensiz yönelimleri vardır. Sadece kendi özgürlükleri değil diğerlerinin özgürlüklerine de değer verip korurlar ve çoğunlukla iyi varlıklardır.

entries.name: Gece Görüşü
entries: Alacakaranlık ormanlara ve gece gökyüzüne alışkın elfler karanlıkta ve loş ışıkta daha iyi görebilirler. Loş ışıkta 60 feete kadar parlak ışıkmış gibi görebilirler, ve karanlıkta sanki loş ışıkmış gibi. Karanlıkta renk ayırt edemezler, sadece grinin tonları olur.

entries.name: Keskin Duyular
entries: Algılama becerisinde uzmanlığın vardır.

entries.name: Fey Soyu
entries: Cezbedilmeye karşı kurtulma zarlarında avantajın vardır ve büyü seni uyutamaz.

entries.name: Trans
entries: Elflerin uykuya ihtiyacı yoktur. Onun yerine günde 4 saat yarıbilinçli bir şekilde derin bir meditasyona girerler. (Bu tip meditasyonlar için yaygın kullanılan sözcük transtır.) Meditasyondayken bir nevi rüya görebilirsin, bunlar yıllarca yaptığın pratikle ulaştığın zihinsel egzersizlerdir. Bu şekilde dinlendikten sonra, bir insanın 8 saatlik uykudan aldığı faydayı sağlarsın.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Elfçe ve Ortak Dili okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. Elfçe zor dilbilgisi ve incelik isteyen tonlamaları ile akcıı bir dildir. Elf edebiyatı zengin ve çeşitlidir, şarkıları ve şiirleri diğer ırklar arasında da ünlüdür. Birçok ozan Elf türkülerini repertuarına ekleyebilmek için dili öğrenir.

entries.name: Üstün Gece Görüşü
entries: Yeraltının derinliklerine alışmış gözlerin karanlık ve loş ışıkta üstün görüş sağlar. Loş ışıkta 120 feete kadar sanki parlak ışıkmış gibi, karanlıkta ise loş ışıkmış gibi görürsün. Karanlıkta renk ayırt edemezsin, sadece grinin tonları olur.

entries.name: Günışığı Hassasiyeti
entries: Sen, hedefin yada algılamak istediğin şey doğrudan günışığında olduğu sürece görüş gerektiren saldırı ve Akıl(Algılama) zarlarında dezavantajın olur.

entries.name: Drow Büyüsü
entries: {@spell Dancing lights} cantripini bilirsin. 3. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell faerie fire} büyüsünü günde bir kere kullanabilirsin, büyüyü bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. 5. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell darkness} büyüsünü de günde bir kere kullanabilirsin, büyüyü bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyüler için büyü yapma yeteneğin Karizmadır.

entries.name: Drow Silah Eğitimi
entries: Meçler, kısa kılıçlar ve el arbaletleri ile uzmanlığın vardır.

entries.name: Elf Silah Eğitimi
entries: Uzun kılıç, kısa kılıç, kısa yay ve uzun yay ile uzmanlıkların vardır.

entries.name: Fey Adımı
entries: Bu özelliği kullanarak {@spell misty step} büyüsünü bir kere kullanabilirsin. Kısa yada uzun dinlenme bitirdikten sonra bu özellik yeniden kullanılabilir.

entries.name: Elf Silah Eğitimi
entries: Uzun kılıç, kısa kılıç, kısa yay ve uzun yay ile uzmanlıkların vardır.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: Büyücü büyü listesinden seçeceğin bir cantrip bilirsin. Bunun için büyü yapma yeteneğin Zekadır.

entries.name: Fazladan Dil
entries: Seçeceğin fazladan bir dil okuyabilir, yazabilir e konuşabilirsin.

entries.name: Elf Silah Eğitimi
entries: Uzun kılıç, kısa kılıç, kısa yay ve uzun yay ile uzmanlıkların vardır.

entries.name: Seri Adımlar
entries: Temel yürüyüş hızın 35 feete yükselir.

entries.name: Doğanın Örtüsü
entries: Çalılıklar, sağanak yağmur, kar yağışı gibi doğal olaylar ile hafifçe örtülmüşken bile saklanmayı deneyebilirsin.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Gnomelar insanlarla aynı hızda olgunlaşır ama çoğunun 40 yaşı civarı yetişkin hayatına geçmesi beklenir. 350 ile 500 yıl arası yaşayabilirler.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Gnomelar genellikle iyidirler. Düzene doğru yönelenler bilge, mühendis, akademisyen, araştırmacı yada mucit olabilirler. Kaosa doğru yönelenler de ozan, hilekar, seyyah yada kuyumcu olabilirler. Gnomelar iyi kalplidirler, aralarındaki hilekarlar bile şiddettense şakaları tercih ederler.

entries.name: Gece Görüşü
entries: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Gnome Kurnazlığı
entries: Büyüye karşı attığın tüm Zeka, Akıl ve Karizma kurtulma zarlarında avantajın olur.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Gnomish ve Ortak Dili okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. Gnomish dili, Cücece dilinin harflerini kullanır ve bu dilde yazılmış teknik anlaşmalar ve doğal dünya ile ilgili bilgi katalogları ile ünlüdür.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Derin gnomelar ırklarına göre daha kısa yaşar. İnsanlarla aynı hızda olgunlaşırlar ve 25 yaşında bir yetişkin olarak görülürler. 200 ile 250 yıl arası yaşarlar ama Yeraltının acımasız yapısı onlara nadir bu fırsatı verir.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Svirfneblin hayatta kalmanın diğer varlıklar ile karışıklıklara girmemek ve düşman sahibi olmamaktan geçtiğine inanır ve genelde nötr kalırlar. Diğerlerinin kötülüğünü istemezler ama diğerleri için riskte almazlar.

entries.name: Üstün Gece Görüşü
entries: Yeraltında hayata alışkın gözleri karanlıkta ve loş ışıkta üstün görüş sağlar. Loş ışıkta 120 feete kadar parlak ışıkmış gibi, karanlıkta loş ışıkmış gibi görürsün. Karanlıkta renk ayırt edemezsin, sadece grinin tonları olur.

entries.name: Taş Kamuflajı
entries: Kayalık arazide atacağın Çeviklik (Gizlenme) zarlarında avantajın olur.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Gnomish, Ortak ve Altortak dillerini okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. Svirfneblin lehçesi yüzey Gnomish'e göre daha gırtlaktan konuşulan bir dildir ve çoğu svirfneblin çok az Ortak dil konuşabilir. Ama dış dünya ile iletişimde olan bir svirfneblin (bir maceracı olarak seni de içerir) diğer diyarlarda ona yetecek kadar Ortak dil öğrenir.

entries.name: Doğal İllüzyonist
entries: {@spell minor illusion} cantripini bilirsin. Bunun için büyü yapma yeteneğin Zekadır.

entries.name: Küçük Hayvanlarla Konuş
entries: Küçük yada daha küçük hayvanlar ile ses ve vücut dili yardımıyla basit kavramları konuşabilirsin. Orman gnomeları hayvanları severler ve genellikle sincap, gelincik, köstebek, tavşan, ağaçkakan gibi hayvanları evcil hayvanları olarak beslerler.

entries.name: Zanaatkarın Bilgisi
entries: Ne zaman büyülü eşyalar, simya nesneleri yada teknolojik icatlara dair bir Zeka (Tarih) zarı atarsan, normalde eklediğin uzmanlık bonusun yerine uzmanlık bonusunun iki katını eklersin.

entries.name: Mucit
entries: Mucitin aletleri ile uzmanlığın olur. Bu aletleri kullanarak 1 saat ve 10 gp değerinde materyal harcayıp Ufak bir kurmalı cihaz (AC 5, 1 HP) yapabilirsin. Cihaz 1 saat harcayıp tamir etmediğin sürece 24 saat sonra bozulur, yada eylemini kullanıp sökebilirsin. Bu şekilde harcadığın materyal yeniden kullanılabilir. Aynı anda bu tip 3 aktif cihazın olabilir.
Bir cihaz yarattığında bu seçeneklerden birini seç:

entries.name: Kurmalı Oyuncak
entries: Bu kurmalı hayvan, yaratık yada insan şekilde bir oyuncaktır. Yere koyulduğunda, oyuncak senin her sıranda yüzeyde rastgele bir yöne 5 feet ilerler. Temsil ettiği varlığa uygun sesler çıkarır.

entries.name: Çakmak
entries: Bu cihaz mum, meşale yada kamp ateşi tutuşturmak için ufak bir alev yaratır. Cihazı eylem olarak kullanabilirsin.

entries.name: Müzik Kutusu
entries: Açıldığında bu müzik kutusu tek bir notayı orta bir seste çalar. Kutu kapatıldığında yada şarkının sonuna geldiğinde müzik sonlanır.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Genç Ejderdoğanlar çabuk büyür. Yumurtadan çıktıktan saatler sonra yürümeye başlarlar, 3 yaşına geldiklerinde 10 yaşındaki bir insan çocuğu gelişimdedirler ve yetişkinliğe 15 yaşında ulaşırlar. 80 yaşına kadar yaşayabilirler.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Ejderdoğanlar uçlara yönelirler, kosmik savaşta iyi yada kötüyü seçerler (Bahamut ve Tiamat tarafında temsil edilir). Çoğu ejderdoğan iyidir ama Tiamat tarafında olanlar korkunç kötüler olabilirler.

entries.name: Draconic Soy
entries: Draconic soyun vardır. Draconic Soy tablosundan bir ejder tipi seç. Nefes silahın ve hasar direncin tabloda gösterildği şekilde bu ejder tipi ile belirlenir.

entries.name: Nefes Silahı
entries: Eylemini kullanarak yıkıcı bir enerji nefesi üfleyebilirsin. Draconic soyun bu üflemenin şekli, boyutu ve hasar tipini belirler.

Nefes silahını kullandığında, nefesin alanındaki tüm varlıklar kurtulma zarı atar, tipi draconic soyun tarafından belirlenir. Bu kurtulma zarı DC'si 8 + Dayanıklılık bonusun + uzmanlık bonusundur. Başarısız bir varlık 2d6 hasar alır, başarılı olanlar yarısını. Hasar 6. seviyede 3d6, 11. seviyede 4d6 ve 16. seviyede 5d6 olur.
Nefes silahını kullandıktan sonra yeniden kullanabilmek için kısa yada uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir.

entries.name: Hasar Direnci
entries: Draconic soyunla ilişkili hasar tipine direncin olur.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Draconic ve Ortak dili okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. Draconic dilinin en eski dillerden biri olduğu düşünülür ve sıklıkla büyü araştırmalarında kullanılır. Dilde bolca sert ünsüz vardır ve kulağa kaba gelir.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Goliathların ömürleri insanlar ile aynıdır. Ergenlik sonu yetişkinliğe girerler ve yüzyıldan az yaşarlar.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Goliath toplumu, belirgin görevleri ve rolleri ile güçlü bir düzene sahiptir. Goliath adalet anlayışı, kendine yetme ve bireysel sorumluluklar ile dengelenip toplumu nötrlüğe iter.

entries.name: Doğal Atlet
entries: Atletizm becerisinde uzmanlığın vardır.

entries.name: Taşın Dayanıklılığı
entries: Zaman zaman odaklanarak yaralanmaları engelleyebilirsin. Hasar aldığında reaksiyonunu kullanıp d12 atabilirsin. Sonuca Dayanıklılık bonusunu da ekleyip toplamı aldığın hasardan düşürürsün. Bu özelliği kullandıktan sonra yeniden kullanabilmek için kısa yada uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir.

entries.name: Güçlü Yapı
entries: İtme, çekme, kaldırma ve taşıma kapasiten hesaplanırken bir boy büyük sayılırsın.

entries.name: Dağda Doğan
entries: 20.000 feete kadar olan yüksekliklere alışkınsın. Doğal olarak soğuk iklimlere de adaptesin.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Dev ve Ortak dillerini okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Yarı-elfler insanlarla aynı hızda olgunlaşırlar ve 20 yaş civarında yetişkin sayılırlar. İnsanlardan çok daha uzun yaşarlar, sıkça 180 yaşını geçtikleri görülmüştür.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Yarı-elfler elf atalarının düzensizliğe eğilimini paylaşırlar. Hem kişisel özgürlüğe hem de yaratıcı ifadeye değer verirler ve ne liderlere sevgileri olur nede takipçi toplama arzuları. Kurallara gülerler, diğerlerinin taleplerine burun kıvırırlar ve bazen güvenilmez olabilirler.

entries.name: Yetenek Skoru Artışı
entries: Seçeceğin iki yetenek skorun 1 artar.

entries.name: Gece Görüşü
entries: Elf kanın sayesinde karanlık ve loş ortamlarda üstün görüşün olur. 60 feet yakınında loş ışığı parlak ışık gibi, karanlıkta ise loş ışık gibi görürsün. Karanlıkta renk ayırt edemezsin, sadece grinin tonları olur.

entries.name: Fey Soyu
entries: Cezbedilmeye karşı attığın kurtulma zarlarında avantajın vardır be büyü seni uyutamaz.

entries.name: Beceri Çokluğu
entries: Seçeceğin iki beceride uzmanlık kazanırsın.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Elfçe, Ortak ve seçeceğin bir dilde okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Yarı-orclar insanlardan biraz daha hızlı olgunlaşır, yetişkinliğe 14 yaş civarı girerler. Belirgin bir şekilde hızlı yaşlanırlar ve nadiren 75 yaş üstünü görürler.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Yarı-orclara orc atalarından kaosa yönelim ve iyiliğe yatkın olmama kalmıştır. Orclar arasında yetişmiş ve istekli bir şekilde orada yaşayan yarı-orclar çoğunlukla kötüdür.

entries.name: Gece Görüşü
entries: Orc kanın sayesinde karanlık ve loş ortamlarda üstün görüşe sahipsin. 60 feet yakınında loş ışığı parlak ışık gibi, karanlıkta da loş ışık gibi görürsün. Karanlıkta renk ayırt edemezsin, sadece grinin tonları olur.

entries.name: Korkutucu
entries: Korkutma becerisinde uzmanlığın vardır.

entries.name: Amansız Dayanıklılık
entries: 0 HP'ye düşürülür ve doğrudan öldürülmezsen, bunun yerine 1 HP'ye düşmeyi seçebilirsin. Bu özelliği uzun dinlenme bitirene kadar bir daha kullanamazsın.

entries.name: Acımasız Saldırılar
entries: Bir yakın dövüş silahı ile yaptığın saldırıda kritik vurursan, silahın hasar zarlarından birini yeniden atıp hasara ekleyebilirsin.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Orc ve Ortak dillerini okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. Orc dili sert ünsüzleri olan gırtlaktan konuşulan bir dildir. Kendi harfleri yoktur ama Cüce dilinin harfleri ile yazılır.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Cüceler insanlarla aynı hızda olgunlaşırlar ama 50 yaşına gelene kadar hala genç sayılırlar. Ortalama olarak 350 yıl yaşarlar.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Çoğu cüce düzenlidir ve sıkı düzeni olan bir toplumun faydalı olduğuna inanır. İyiliğe de yatkındırlar, güçlü bir adalet algısı ve herkesin düzenli bir toplumdan faydalanma hakkı olduğu inancı onları bu yöne iter.

entries.name: Hız
entries: Ağır zırh giymek hızını düşürmez.

entries.name: Gece Görüşü
entries: Yer altında yaşamaya alışkın olduğun için karanlık ve loş ortamlarda üstün görüşün vardır. 60 feet yakınında loş ışığı parlak ışık gibi, karanlıkta da loş ışık gibi görürsün. Karanlıkta renk ayırt edemezsin, sadece grinin tonları olur.

entries.name: Cüce Bünyesi
entries: Zehre karşı kurtulma zarlarında avantajın olur ve zehir hasarına karşı direncin vardır.

entries.name: Cüce Savaş Eğitimi
entries: Savaş baltası, el baltası, hafif çekiç ve savaş çekici ile uzmanlıkların vardır.

entries.name: Alet Uzmanlığı
entries: Demirci aletleri, taşçı aletleri yada mayacı malzemeleri seçeneklerinden birinde uzmanlık kazanırsın.

entries.name: Taş Kurnazlığı
entries: Bir taş işinin aslı ile ilgili atacağın Zeka (Tarih) zarlarında uzman sayılırsın ve normal uzmanlık bonusun yerine iki katını eklersin.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Cücece ve Ortak dili okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. Cücece sert ünsüzler ve diyaframdan seslerle doludur ve bu özellikler bir cücenin konuşacağı diğer dillere de yansıyabilir.

entries.name: Cüce Sertliği
entries: HP maksimumun 1 artar ve her seviye alışında 1 yükselir.

entries.name: Cüce Zırh Eğitimi
entries: Hafif ve orta zırhlarla uzmanlığın olur.

entries.name: Üstün Gece Görüşü
entries: Yer altında yaşamaya alışkın olduğun için karanlık ve loş ortamlarda üstün görüşün vardır. 120 feet yakınında loş ışığı parlak ışık gibi, karanlıkta da loş ışık gibi görürsün. Karanlıkta renk ayırt edemezsin, sadece grinin tonları olur.

entries.name: Duergar Bünyesi
entries: Zehre karşı atacağın kurtulma zarlarında avantajın ve zehir hasarına karşı direncin olur. İllüzyonlar, cezbedilme ve felç olmaya karşı atacağın kurtulma zarlarında da avantajın vardır.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Cücece, Ortak ve Altortak dillerini okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin.

entries.name: Duergar Büyüsü
entries: 3. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell Enlarge/Reduce} büyüsünü kendi üzerinde sadece büyüme özelliği ile bir kere kullanabilirsin. 5. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell Invisibility} büyüsünü kendi üzerinde bir kere kullanabilirsin. Bu büyüler için materyal bileşenlere ihtiyaç duymazsın ve doğrudan günışığında kullanamazsın. Günışığı büyüler zaten kullanılmışsa bir etki göstermez. Bu özellik ile büyüleri yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyüler için büyü yapma yeteneğin Zekadır.

entries.name: Günışığı Hassasiyeti
entries: Sen, hedefin yada algılamak istediğin şey doğrudan günışığında olduğu sürece görüş gerektiren saldırı ve Akıl(Algılama) zarlarında dezavantajın olur.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: İnsanlar yetişkinliğe ergenlik sonrası girerler ve yüzyıldan az yaşarlar.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: İnsanların belirgin bir yönelimi yoktur. Aralarında en iyisi de kötüsü de bulunabilir.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Ortak ve seçeceğin bir dili okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. İnsanlar genel olarak iletişime geçtikleri diğer halkların dillerini öğrenirler, nadir lehçelerde buna dahildir. Dillerine diğer dillerden aldıkları sözcükleri serpiştirmeyi severler: Orc küfürleri, Elf müzik ifadeleri, Cüce askeri kalıpları, vb...

entries.name: Beceri
entries: Seçeceğin bir beceride uzmanlık kazanırsın.

entries.name: Feat
entries: Seçeceğin bir feat kazanırsın.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Bir buçukluk 20 yaş civarı yetişkinliğe girer ve genelde ikinci yüzyılının ortalarına kadar yaşar.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Çoğu buçukluk düzenli iyidir. Kural olarak iyi kalpli ve naziktirler, diğerlerini acı içinde görmekten nefret ederler ve baskıya karşı hiç toleransları yoktur. Aynı zamanda çok düzenli ve gelenekseldirler, toplumlarının desteğine ve eski yollarının huzuruna güvenirler.

entries.name: Şanslı
entries: Bir saldırı, yetenek yada kurtulma zarında 1 atarsan zarı yeniden atıp ikinci sonucu kullanabilirsin.

entries.name: Cesur
entries: Korkmaya karşı atacağın kurtulma zarlarında avantajın olur.

entries.name: Buçukluk Çevikliği
entries: Senden bir boyut büyük olan bir varlığın alanından geçebilirsin.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Buçukluk ve Ortak dili okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin. Buçukluk dili bir sır değildir ama buçukluklar onu diğerleri ile paylaşmayı sevmez. Nadir yazarlar, bu yüzden zengin bir edebiyatları yoktur. Buna rağmen sözlü gelenekleri çok güçlüdür. Neredeyse tüm buçukluklar seyahat boyunca karşılaştıkları yada birlikte yaşadıkları kişiler ile konuşabilmek için Ortak dili öğrenirler.

entries.name: Doğal Gizlenme
entries: Senden sadece bir boyut büyük bir varlığın örtüsünde bile gizlenmeyi deneyebilirsin.

entries.name: Tıknaz Bünye
entries: Zehre karşı atacağın kurtulma zarlarında avantajın ve zehir hasarına direncin olur.

entries.name: Sessiz Konuşma
entries: 30 feet yakınındaki bir varlık ile telepatik olarak konuşabilirsin. Sadece varlıkla bir dil paylaşıyorsan seni anlayabilir. Bu şekilde tek seferde sadece bir varlık ile konuşabilirsin.

entries.name: Yaş
entries: Tieflingler insanlarla aynı hızda olgunlaşır ama birkaç yıl fazla yaşarlar.

entries.name: Yönelim
entries: Tieflinglerin doğuştan kötülüğe yatkınlığı olmayabilir ama birçoğu orada yerini bulur. Kötü yada değil, bağımsız yapıları yüzünden çoğu tiefling düzensizliğe yönelir.

entries.name: Gece Görüşü
entries: Infernal kanları sayesinde tieflingler karanlık ve loş ortamlarda üstün görüşe sahiptir. 60 feet yakınında loş ışığı parlak ışık gibi, karanlıkta da loş ışık gibi görürsün. Karanlıkta renk ayırt edemezsin, sadece grinin tonları olur.

entries.name: Cehennem Direnci
entries: Ateş hasarına direncin vardır.

entries.name: Diller
entries: Infernal ve Ortak dillerini okuyabilir, yazabilir ve konuşabilirsin.

entries.name: Infernal Miras
entries: {@spell Thaumaturgy} cantripini bilirsin. 3. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell hellish rebuke} büyüsünü bir kez 2. seviye büyü olarak kullanabilirsin. Büyüyü bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. 5. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell darkness} büyüsünü de bir kez kullanabilirsin. Bu büyüyü de bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyüler için büyü yapma yeteneğin Karizmadır.

entries.name: Görünüş
entries: Senin tieflingin diğerleri gibi görünmeyebilir. PHB'de tasvir edilen özelliklere sahip olmaktansa şu özelliklerden 1d4+1 tanesini seç: küçük boynuzlar; keskin dişler; çatallı dil; kedi benzeri gözler; her elde altı parmak; keçi gibi bacaklar; ayrık toynaklar; çatallı kuyruk; pullu deri; kırmızı yada koyu mavi ten; gölgen yada yansıman olmaz; kükürt kokusu yayarsın.

entries.name: Infernal Miras (PHB)
entries: {@spell Thaumaturgy} cantripini bilirsin. 3. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell hellish rebuke} büyüsünü bir kez 2. seviye büyü olarak kullanabilirsin. Büyüyü bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. 5. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell darkness} büyüsünü de bir kez kullanabilirsin. Bu büyüyü de bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyüler için büyü yapma yeteneğin Karizmadır.

entries.name: Şeytan Dili
entries: {@spell Vicious mockery} cantripini bilirsin. 3. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell charm person} büyüsünü bir kez 2. seviye büyü olarak kullanabilirsin. Büyüyü bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. 5. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell enthrall} büyüsünü de bir kez kullanabilirsin. Bu büyüyü de bu şekilde yeniden kullanabilmek için uzun dinlenme bitirmen gerekir. Bu büyüler için büyü yapma yeteneğin Karizmadır. Bu özellik Infernal Miras özelliğinin yerine geçer.

entries.name: Cehennem Ateşi
entries: 3. seviyeye ulaştığında {@spell burning hands} büyüsünü bir kez 2. seviye büyü olarak kullanabilirsin. Bu özellik Infernal Miras özelliğinin {@spell hellish rebuke} büyüsünü değiştirir.

entries.name: Winged
entries: Kürek kemiklerinden yarasa kanadına benzer kanatlar çıkar. Ağır zırh giymediğin sürece 30 feet uçma hızın olur.

entries.name: Age
entries: Bugbears reach adulthood at age 16 and live up to 80 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Bugbears endure a harsh existence that demands each of them to remain self-sufficient, even at the expense of their fellows. They tend to be chaotic evil.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Long-Limbed
entries: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Sneaky
entries: You are proficient in the Stealth skill.

entries.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Age
entries: Aasimar mature at the same rate as humans, but they can live up to 160 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Imbued with celestial power, most aasimar are good. Outcast aasimar are most often neutral or even evil.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Blessed with a radiant soul, your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Celestial Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

entries.name: Healing Hands
entries: As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain a number of hit points equal to your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Light Bearer
entries: You know the {@spell light} cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Celestial.

entries.name: Necrotic Shroud
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to turn into pools of darkness and two skeletal, ghostly, flightless wings to sprout from your back. The instant you transform, other creatures within 10 feet of you that can see you must succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or become {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra necrotic damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra necrotic damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Radiant Soul
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to glimmer and two luminous, incorporeal wings to sprout from your back.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you have a flying speed of 30 feet, and once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Radiant Consumption
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing a searing light to radiate from you, pour out of your eyes and mouth, and threaten to char you.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, you and each creature within 10 feet of you take radiant damage equal to half your level (rounded up). In addition, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: As humanoids related to the fey, firbolg have long lifespans. A firbolg reaches adulthood around 30, and the oldest of them can live for 500 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: As people who follow the rhythm of nature and see themselves as its caretakers, firbolg are typically neutral good. Evil firbolg are rare and are usually the sworn enemies of the rest of their kind.

entries.name: Firbolg Magic
entries: You can cast {@spell detect magic} and {@spell disguise self} with this trait, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability for them. Once you cast either spell, you can't cast it again with this trait until you finish a short or long rest. When you use this version of {@spell disguise self}, you can seem up to 3 feet shorter than normal, allowing you to more easily blend in with humans and elves.

entries.name: Hidden Step
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically turn {@condition invisible} until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
entries: You have the ability to communicate in a limited manner with beasts and plants. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return. You have advantage on all Charisma checks you make to influence them.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and Giant.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goblins reach adulthood at age 8 and live up to 60 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Goblins are typically neutral evil, as they care only for their own needs. A few goblins might tend toward good or neutrality, but only rarely.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Fury of the Small
entries: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Nimble Escape
entries: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Age
entries: Hobgoblins mature at the same rate as humans and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Hobgoblin society is built on fidelity to a rigid, unforgiving code of conduct. As such, they tend toward lawful evil.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Martial Training
entries: You are proficient with two martial weapons of your choice and with light armor.

entries.name: Saving Face
entries: Hobgoblins are careful not to show weakness in front of their allies, for fear of losing status. If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kenku have shorter lifespans than humans. They reach maturity at about 12 years old and can live to 60.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Kenku are chaotic creatures, rarely making enduring commitments, and they care mostly for preserving their own hides. They are generally chaotic neutral in outlook.

entries.name: Expert Forgery
entries: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork. You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.

entries.name: Kenku Training
entries: You are proficient in your choice of two of the following skills: Acrobatics, Deception, Stealth, and Sleight of Hand.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check opposed by your Charisma (Deception) check.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can read and write Common and Auran, but you can only speak using your Mimicry trait.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kobolds reach adulthood at age 6 and can live up to 120 years but rarely do so.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Kobolds are fundamentally selfish, making them evil, but their reliance on the strength of their group makes them trend toward law.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
entries: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that you can see. Once you uses this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

entries.name: Age
entries: Lizardfolk reach maturity around age 14 and rarely live longer than 60 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most lizardfolk are neutral. They see the world as a place of predators and prey, where life and death are natural processes. They wish only to survive, and prefer to leave other creatures to their own devices.

entries.name: Swim Speed
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Bite
entries: Your fanged maw is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Cunning Artisan
entries: As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone and hide from a slain beast, construct, dragon, monstrosity, or plant creature of size small or larger to create one of the following items: a shield, a club, a javelin, or 1d4 darts or blowgun needles. To use this trait, you need a blade, such as a dagger, or appropriate artisan's tools, such as leatherworker's tools.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

entries.name: Hunter's Lore
entries: You gain proficiency with two of the following skills of your choice: Animal Handling, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Hungry Jaws
entries: In battle, you can throw yourself into a vicious feeding frenzy. As a bonus action, you can make a special attack with your bite. If the attack hits, it deals its normal damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1), and you can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

entries.name: Age
entries: Orcs reach adulthood at age 12 and live up to 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Orcs are vicious raiders, who believe that the world should be theirs. They also respect strength above all else and believe the strong must bully the weak to ensure that weakness does not spread like a disease. They are usually chaotic evil.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your movement speed toward a hostile creature you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You are trained in the Intimidation skill.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.

entries.name: Age
entries: Tabaxi have lifespans equivalent to humans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Tabaxi tend toward chaotic alignments, as they let impulse and fancy guide their decisions. They are rarely evil, with most of them driven by curiosity rather than greed or other dark impulses.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You have a cat's keen senses, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Feline Agility
entries: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

entries.name: Cat's Claws
entries: Because of your claws, you have a climbing speed of 20 feet. In addition, your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Cat's Talents
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception and Stealth skills.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Tritons reach maturity around age 15 and can live up to 200 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Tritons tend toward lawful good. As guardians of the darkest reaches of the sea, their culture pushes them toward order and benevolence.

entries.name: Swim Speed
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Control Air and Water
entries: A child of the sea, you can call on the magic of elemental air and water. You can cast {@spell fog cloud} with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast {@spell gust of wind} with it, and starting at 5th level, you can also cast {@spell wall of water|xge} with it. Once you cast a spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: Aquatic beasts have an extraordinary affinity with your people. You can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return.

entries.name: Guardians of the Depths
entries: Adapted to even the most extreme ocean depths, you have resistance to cold damage, and you ignore any of the drawbacks caused by a deep, underwater environment.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Primordial.

entries.name: Age
entries: Purebloods mature at the same rate as humans and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Purebloods are devoid of emotion and see others as tools to manipulate. They care little for law or chaos and are typically neutral evil.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: You know the {@spell poison spray} cantrip. You can cast {@spell animal friendship} an unlimited number of times with this trait, but you can target only snakes with it. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast {@spell suggestion} with this trait. Once you cast it, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Poison Immunity
entries: You are immune to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Abyssal, and Draconic.

entries.name: Duplicity
entries: You gain proficiency in the Deception skill.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries: As an action, you can polymorph into any humanoid of your size that you have seen, or back into your true form. However, your equipment does not change with you. If you die, you revert to your natural appearance.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: Composite Plating
entries: Your construction incorporates wood and metal, granting you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

entries.name: Living Construct
entries: Even though you were constructed, you are a living creature. You are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe, but you can ingest food and drink if you wish.

Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You do not dream in this state; you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Revenant Subrace
entries: Having met a cruel and undeserved end, you have returned to the realm of the living. As a revenant, you thirst for revenge against those who wronged you in life, or seek to complete a final, critical task you left unfinished.

The revenant subrace can be applied to any race that has a subrace, and replaces that race's existing subrace options. Alternatively, you can apply this new subrace to a race without subrace options using the modification options provided below.

Your DM might also allow you to take this subrace for a slain character. In that case, your character rises from the dead with its original subrace replaced (or with the necessary modifications made to its base traits), filled with a determination to seek vengeance or complete its mission.

entries.name: Racial Adjustments
entries: For races that don't have subrace options, taking on the revenant subrace means making changes to your character's base traits, as follows. (This playtest article provides options only for human and dragonborn characters. Any other races which do not have subrace options should not be used with these revenant subrace rules.)

entries.name: Human Revenant
entries: If you want to play a human revenant, modify the human's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1. If you use the variant human traits, remove the Skills trait and the Feat trait.

entries.name: Dragonborn Revenant
entries: If you want to play a dragonborn revenant, modify the dragonborn's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Your Strength score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 1. Additionally, your Draconic Ancestry trait uses necrotic damage as its damage type, replacing the damage type that applies to your breath weapon and your damage resistance.

entries.name: Tiefling Revenant
entries: A prior installment of Unearthed Arcana (That Old Black Magic) outlined two tiefling variants that make use of subraces. Use that article to make a tiefling revenant, replacing the subrace options with the revenant subrace options. The base tiefling traits from the article are as follows:

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Relentless Nature
entries: Your DM assigns a goal to you—typically, one related to your character's death. The goal must be a specific task you can complete, such as slaying an enemy or liberating an area and its people. Until you fulfill that goal, you gain the following benefits:

items: If you are below half your hit point maximum at the start of your turn, you regain 1 hit point.

If you die, you return to life 24 hours after death. If your body is destroyed, you reform within 1 mile of the place of your death at a spot determined by the DM. If your equipment was also destroyed, you do not regain it.

You know the distance and direction between you and any creature involved in your goal, such as a person you seek vengeance against or someone you pledged to defend. This awareness fails if the creature is on another plane of existence.

entries: When your goal is complete, you finally find rest. You die and cannot be restored to life.

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Minotaurs believe in a strict code of honor, and thus tend toward law. They are loyal to the death and make implacable enemies, even as their brutal culture and disdain for weakness push them toward evil.

entries.name: Conqueror's Virtue
entries: From a young age, you focused on one of the three virtues of strength, cunning, or intellect. Your choice of your Strength, Intelligence, or Wisdom score increases by 1.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You are never unarmed. You are proficient with your horns, which are a melee weapon that deals 1d10 piercing damage. Your horns grant you advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved yourself.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: When you use the Dash action during your turn, you can make a melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: When you use the Attack action during your turn to make a melee attack, you can attempt to shove a creature with your horns as a bonus action. You cannot use this shove attempt to knock a creature {@condition prone}.

entries.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: You can perfectly recall any path you have traveled.

entries.name: Sea Reaver
entries: You gain proficiency with navigator's tools and vehicles (water).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Swimming
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Merfolk, and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the bard spell list. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Creed of the Trickster
entries: You have proficiency in the Sleight of Hand and Stealth skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the druid spell list. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Wind Creed Manipulation
entries: You have proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Water Creed Navigation
entries: You have proficiency with navigator tools and in the Survival skill.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goblins mature faster than humans, reaching adulthood at around age 12. They also age noticeably faster than humans, and even the most cautious goblins rarely live longer than 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most goblins are wildly chaotic, though they have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Grit
entries: You have resistance to fire damage and psychic damage. In addition, when you are wearing no armor, your AC is equal to 11 + your Dexterity modifier.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Grogtag Tamer
entries: You have proficiency in the Animal Handling skill.

entries.name: Lavastep Grit
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky or subterranean environments.

entries.name: Tuktuk Cunning
entries: You have proficiency with thieves' tools.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kor mature at the same rate as humans and live about as long.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most kor are lawful good, with a strong dedication to community and the traditions of their ancestors.

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Climbing
entries: You also have a climbing speed of 30 feet as long as you are not encumbered or wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Kor Climbing
entries: You have proficiency in the Athletics and Acrobatics skills.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, and communicate in the silent speech of the Kor.

entries.name: Lucky
entries: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

entries.name: Age
entries: Vampires don't mature and age in the same way that other races do. Every living vampire is either a bloodchief, infected by Ulamog's influence in the distant reaches of history, or was spawned by a bloodchief from a living human. Most vampires are thus very old, but few have any memory of their earliest years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Vampires have no innate tendency toward evil, but consuming the life energy of other creatures often pushes them to that end. Regardless of their moral bent, the strict hierarchies of their bloodchiefs inclines them toward a lawful alignment.

entries.name: Blood Thirst
entries: You can drain blood and life energy from a willing creature, or one that is {@condition grappled} by you, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. Make a melee attack against the target. If you hit, you deal 1 piercing damage and 1d6 necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and you regain hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid killed in this way becomes a null (see "Zendikar Bestiary").

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Vampire.

entries.name: Vampiric Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Age
entries: Aetherborn come into being as adults and live no more than a few years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: As a rule, aetherborn are driven by hedonism and self-interest, making them neutral at best

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Born of Aether
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: Gift of the Aetherborn
entries: An unknown aetherborn, desperately seeking a means to extend their short life, discovered a process of transformation that prolonged their existence—by giving them the ability to feed on the life essence of other beings. Since then, other aetherborn have learned and carried out this monstrous transformation, and aetherborn with this "gift" have become a small minority among an already small population.

A gifted aetherborn has the ability to drain the life essence of other beings. Similar to the way heat is transferred from a warm object to a cold one, a gifted aetherborn need only touch another living being with a clawed hand to draw life essence out, fueling their own continued existence while draining strength and vitality from their victim.

For many aetherborn, living as they do for indulgence and instant gratification, the concepts of "want" and "need" are virtually synonymous. But Aetherborn with this gift understand what it is to truly need, for they develop a hunger for life essence that far exceeds any desires they might have felt before their transformation. A gifted aetherborn who abstains from this feeding deteriorates even more rapidly than other aetherborn, while enduring unspeakable agony caused by the deprivation of life energy.

At the DM's option, an aetherborn character can research methods of achieving this dark "gift." The process is similar to inventing and manufacturing a rare magic item (see "Inventing and Manufacturing Devices" earlier in this document). But rather than aether, the process requires a variety of rare unguents and unusual ingredients that make up the cost of researching and undergoing the transformation.

An aetherborn with this gift gains the Drain Life ability: a natural attack that deals 1d6 necrotic damage and restores the same number of hit points to the aetherborn. However, if the aetherborn goes for 7 days without dealing this damage, their hit point maximum is reduced by 1d6 per week. This reduction can't be removed until the aetherborn has used their Drain Life ability and completed a long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most dwarves are lawful, believing firmly in the benefits of a well-ordered society. They tend toward good as well, with a strong sense of fair play and a belief that everyone deserves to share in the benefits of a just order.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground in your race's ancient past, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

entries.name: Dwarven Toughness
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Artisan's Expertise
entries: You gain proficiency with two kinds of artisan's tools of your choice. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies. In addition, whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of any architectural construction (including buildings, public works such as canals and aqueducts, and the massive cogwork that underlies much of the construction of Ghirapur), you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Dwarvish. Dwarvish is full of hard consonants and guttural sounds, and those characteristics spill over into whatever other language a dwarf might speak.

entries.name: Age
entries: Vedalken mature at the same rate humans do, and most are expected to settle down into an adult life by around age 40. They can live 350 to almost 500 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Vedalken are most often lawful and rarely evil.

entries.name: Vedalken Cunning
entries: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

entries.name: Aether Lore
entries: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to magic items or aether-powered technological devices, you can add twice your proficiency bonus, instead of any proficiency bonus you normally apply.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Vedalken. The Vedalken language is renowned for its technical treatises and its catalogs of knowledge about the natural world and the aether that pervades it.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Forest Folk
entries: You have proficiency in the Survival skill.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

entries.name: Sure-footed
entries: When you use the Dash action, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.

entries.name: Spring Attack
entries: When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of your turn, whether you hit or not.

entries.name: Breadth of Knowledge
entries: You gain proficiency in any combination of four skills or with four tools of your choice.

entries.name: Daunting
entries: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

entries.name: Tough
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 2, and it increases by 2 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Age
entries: Aasimar mature at the same rate as humans but live a few years longer.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Due to their celestial heritage, aasimar are often good. However, some aasimar fall into evil, rejecting their heritage.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your celestial heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Celestial Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.

entries.name: Celestial Legacy
entries: You know the {@spell light} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell lesser restoration} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Once you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell daylight} spell once with this trait as a 3rd-level spell, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Celestial.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens. Most human initiates have completed the trials and found a glorious or inglorious death before they turn 30. Viziers can enjoy longer service to their gods, in theory living up to a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

entries.name: Skills
entries: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

entries.name: Feat
entries: You gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Like humans, aven reach adulthood in their late teens and can theoretically live into their 80s. Of course, most find a glorious (or inglorious) death long before that point.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most aven lean toward some form of neutrality. Ibis-headed aven, focused more on knowledge than any other virtue, are usually neutral. Hawk-headed aven are inclined toward lawful neutral.

entries.name: Flight
entries: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. You can't use your flying speed while you wear medium or heavy armor. (If your campaign uses the variant rule for encumbrance, you can't use your flying speed if you are encumbered.)

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aven.

entries.name: Kefnet's Blessing
entries: You can add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any Intelligence check you make that doesn't already include your proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Hawkeyed
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception skill. In addition, attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls.

entries.name: Age
entries: Khenra mature quickly, reaching adulthood in their early teens. Khenra initiates are usually the youngest in a crop, completing the trials by their late teens. Even without a violent death, they rarely live past 60.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most khenra lean toward chaotic alignments. They have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

entries.name: Khenra Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the khopesh (longsword), spear, and javelin.

entries.name: Khenra Twins.
entries: If your twin is alive and you can see your twin, whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. If your twin is dead (or if you were born without a twin), you can't be {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Khenra.

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs develop more slowly than humans, reaching full maturity around the age of 20. They typically become acolytes at around 8 or 9 years old, making them among the older members of their crops. Once they reach maturity, though, minotaurs age quickly, rushing headlong through the trials (as they do all aspects of life) to complete them before they pass their peak. A minotaur allowed to die of old age would rarely live beyond 40.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most minotaurs lean toward chaotic alignments, and they have a slight inclination toward evil.

entries.name: Natural Weapon
entries: You can use your horns as a natural weapon to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with your horns, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Savage Attacks
entries: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Minotaur.

entries.name: Age
entries: Like humans, naga reach adulthood in their late teens. They show no signs of aging beyond that point except for growing larger, so in theory, a naga could live well over a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most naga are either neutral or neutral evil in alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Naga stand about 5 feet tall when upright, but the total length of their bodies, head to tail, ranges from 10 to as much as 20 feet. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed Burst
entries: By lowering your body to the ground and propelling yourself with your arms, you can move more quickly for a time. As a bonus action on your turn, if you have both hands free, you can increase your walking speed by 5 feet until the end of your turn.

entries.name: Natural Weapons
entries: Your fanged maw and constricting serpentine body are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes.

If you hit with your bite, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, and your target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, the target takes 1d4 poison damage.

If you hit with your constrict attack, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and you can't constrict another target.

entries.name: Poison Immunity
entries: You are immune to poison damage and can't be {@condition poisoned}.

entries.name: Poison Affinity
entries: You gain proficiency with the poisoner's kit.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Naga.

entries.name: Age
entries: Gith reach adulthood in their late teens and live for about a century.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Gith.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Githyanki tend toward lawful evil.  They are self-centered, violent, and arrogant, yet they remain the faithful servants of their lich-queen, Vlaakith. Renegade githyanki tend toward chaos as they have forsaken her will.

entries.name: Decadent Mastery
entries: You learn one language of your choice, and you are proficient with one skill or tool of your choice. In the timeless city of Tu'narath, githyanki have bountiful time to master odd bits of knowledge.

entries.name: Martial Prodigy
entries: You are proficient with light and medium armor. Your people are ever ready for war.

entries.name: Githyanki Psionics
entries: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast {@spell jump} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell misty step} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.
Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells. You can cast all of them without components.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Githzerai tend toward lawful neutral. Their rigorous training in psychic abilities requires an implacable mental discipline.

entries.name: Monastic Training
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you aren't wearing medium or heavy armor and aren't using a shield. All githzerai receive basic training from monks, and the monks among them are unmatched in their defensive abilities.

entries.name: Githzerai Psionics
entries: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast {@spell shield} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell detect thoughts} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.
Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells. You can cast all of them without components.

entries.name: Age
entries: Young tortles crawl for a few weeks after birth before learning to walk on two legs. They reach adulthood by the age of 15 and live an average of 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Tortles tend to lead orderly, ritualistic lives. They develop customs and routines, becoming more set in their ways as they age. Most are lawful good. A few can be selfish and greedy, tending more toward evil, but it's unusual for a tortle to shuck off order in favor of chaos.

entries.name: Claws
entries: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour at a time. Tortles aren't natural swimmers, but they can remain underwater for some time before needing to come up for air.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: Due to your shell and the shape of your body, you are ill-suited to wearing armor. Your shell provides ample protection, however; it gives you a base AC of 17 (your Dexterity modifier doesn't affect this number). You gain no benefit from wearing armor, but if you are using a shield, you can apply the shield's bonus as normal.

entries.name: Shell Defense
entries: You can withdraw into your shell as an action. until you emerge, you gain a +4 bonus to AC, and you have advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in your shell, you are {@condition prone}, your speed is 0 and can't increase, you have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, you can't take reaction, and the only action you can take is a bonus action to emerge from your shell.

entries.name: Survival Instinct
entries: You gain proficiency in the Survival skill. Tortles have finely honed survival instincts.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Aquan and Common.

entries.name: Age
entries: Grungs mature to adulthood in a single year, but have been known to live up to 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most grungs are lawful, having been raised in a strict caste system. They tend toward evil as well, coming from a culture where social advancement occurs rarely, and most often because another member of your army has died and there is no one else of that caste to fill the vacancy.

entries.name: Arboreal Alertness
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Poison Immunity
entries: You're immune to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition.

entries.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: Any creature that grapples you or otherwise comes into direct contact with your skin must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature no longer in direct contact with you can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

You can also apply this poison to any piercing weapon as part of an attack with that weapon, though when you hit the poison reacts differently. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 2d4 poison damage.

entries.name: Standing Leap
entries: Your long jump is up to 25 feet and your high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

entries.name: Water Dependency
entries: If you fail to immerse yourself in water for at least 1 hour during a day, you suffer one level of {@condition exhaustion} at the end of that day. You can only recover from this {@condition exhaustion} through magic or by immersing yourself in water for at least 1 hour.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Grung.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: You can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when you speak in Bullywug.

entries.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

entries.name: Standing Leap
entries: Your long jump is up to 20 ft. and your high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Bullywug.

entries.name: Bite
entries: Your fanged maw is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Rampage
entries: When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on your turn, you can take a bonus action to move up to half your speed and make a bite attack.

entries.name: Blindsight
entries: You have no eyes, and cannot be blinded. You can perceive your surroundings within 30 ft., or 10 ft. while deafened. You are considered blind beyond this radius.

entries.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

entries.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Undercommon.

entries.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature you hit with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 ft. of an ally of yours that isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: You can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of you that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. You can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

entries.name: Slippery
entries: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Undercommon.

entries.name: Age
entries: Merfolk mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live considerably longer than humans, though, often reaching well over 100 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most merfolk are neutral, though merfolk of the Emeria and Cosi creeds have chaotic leanings.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aquan.

entries.name: Brittle Bones
entries: You are vulnerable to bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Undead Nature
entries: You are immune to poison damage and exhaustion, and you can't be poisoned. You don't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can't speak, but you can understand the languages you knew in life.

entries.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

entries.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 ft. of you must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: Your thick hide grants you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Troglodyte.

entries.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces you to 0 hit points, you must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, you drop to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: Undead Nature
entries: You are immune to poison damage and exhaustion, and you can't be poisoned. You don't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can't speak, but you can understand the languages you knew in life.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice. Or, if your campaign uses the optional rules for languages found in the previous section, your national origin determines your native language: Itzocan for the Sun Empire, Coalition pidgin for the Brazen Coalition, or Vampire for the Legion of Dusk. You still speak one additional language of your choice, and Common if it exists in your campaign.

entries.name: Age
entries: Vampires don't mature and age in the same way that other races do.

entries.name: Alignment
